00043 /*****************************************************************************/
00044 /**
00045  * @class AAOptionsTest
00046  * @brief cppunit class for testing invalid console options.
00047  */
00048 /*****************************************************************************/

00050 {
00051 
00052 private:
00053 
00054   map<string, string>        m_oneToOneOptions;
00055   vector< vector< string > > m_sampleTable;
00056   vector< string >           m_experimentListVector;
00057 
00058   RunTimeEnvironment rte;
00059 
00060   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(AAOptionsTest);
00061   CPPUNIT_TEST(setUp);
00062   CPPUNIT_TEST(noOptions);
00063   CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00064 
00065 public:

00067   void noOptions();

00082 /*****************************************************************************/
00083 /*****************************************************************************/
00084 /**
00085  * OptionsTest::run
00086  *
00087  */
00088 /*****************************************************************************/
00089 void AAOptionsTest::noOptions()
00090 {
00091 
00092   Util::PrintTextFunctionTitle("AAOptionsTest", "noOptions");
00093 
00094   Err::setThrowStatus(true);
00095 
00096   TranslationEngine te;
00097 
00098   te.m_controllerMask |= C_CMDLINE;
00099 
00100   NEGATIVE_TEST(te.run(), Except);
00101   cerr << "ok" << endl;
00102 
00103   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(te.m_rte.m_invalidOptionsMask & ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_TRANSLATION_TABLE);
00104 
00105   CPPUNIT_ASSERT(te.m_rte.m_invalidOptionsMask & ADT_INVALID_OPTION_MASK_MISSING_EXPERIMENT_CHP);
00106 
00107 }
00108 // end AAOptionsTest::noOptions
